item.title: 🟡 07:43 The threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 07:43 The threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Pokrovskaya_The territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
